notes.body: Some users may be experiencing issues resetting their passwords, particularly when trying to set up two-factor authentication. We're investigating and we're very sorry for the disruption.

active_incidents.title: Screen readers are not announcing unread messages when using the Ctrl + K command on Windows.

notes.body: Some customers who use screen readers on Windows are reporting they can no longer hear their unread messages when they use the Ctrl + K command. Our team are investigating the root cause of this issue. Weâ€™ll be back with another update as soon as we have more information to share.
